To install R and RStudio on Mac:

1. [Download R](https://www.stats.bris.ac.uk/R/bin/macosx/) note this link is for UK users. If you are outside the UK use [this link](https://cran.r-project.org/mirrors.html) selecting your country (or nearest available country))

1. Install R - run the downloaded .pkg and follow the prompts

1. [Download RStudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download) select the macOS 10.12+  option

1. Install RStudio - run the downloaded .pkg and follow the prompts
